description: Number of rooted trees where each node has at most 4 children.
maple: A := 1; f := proc(n) global A; local A2,A3,A4; A2 := subs(x=x^2,A); A3 := subs(x=x^3,A); A4 := subs(x=x^4,A);coeff(series( 1+x*( (A^4+3*A2^2+8*A*A3+6*A^2*A2+6*A4)/2 ), x, n+1), x,n); end;for n from 1 to 50 do A := series(A+f(n)*x^n,x,n +1); od: A;
mathematica: a = 1; f[n_] := Module[{a2, a3, a4}, a2 = a /. x -> x^2; a3 = a /. x -> x^3; a4 = a /. x -> x^4; Coefficient[ Series[ 1 + x*(a^4 + 3*a2^2 + 8*a*a3 + 6*a^2*a2 + 6*a4)/24, {x, 0, n + 1}] // Normal, x, n]]; For[n = 1, n <= 30, n++, a = Series[a + f[n]*x^n, {x, 0, n + 1}] // Normal]; CoefficientList[a, x] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jan 16 2013, after Maple *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
